new_example: Piaccio sempre alle persone gentili che apprezzano la sincerità e l'onestà
new_example_english: I always appeal to kind people who appreciate sincerity and honesty

new_example: Tu piaci a quella ragazza che incontri ogni giorno alla fermata dell'autobus?
new_example_english: Do you appeal to that girl you meet every day at bus stop?

new_example: Lei piace molto ai suoi studenti perché è paziente e comprensiva
new_example_english: She is very popular with her students because she's patient and understanding

new_example: Piacciamo ai nostri vicini di casa perché siamo sempre disponibili ad aiutare
new_example_english: We appeal to our neighbors because we're always available to help

new_example: Voi piacete ai vostri colleghi di lavoro per la vostra professionalità?
new_example_english: Do you appeal to your work colleagues for your professionalism?

new_example: Piacciono a tutti perché hanno un carattere allegro e positivo
new_example_english: They appeal to everyone because they have cheerful and positive character

new_example: Sono piaciuto immediatamente ai genitori della mia fidanzata durante la cena
new_example_english: I immediately appealed to my girlfriend's parents during dinner

new_example: Sei piaciuto al direttore durante il colloquio di lavoro che hai sostenuto?
new_example_english: Did you appeal to director during job interview you took?

new_example: È piaciuto a tutti i professori per la sua dedizione agli studi
new_example_english: He appealed to all professors for his dedication to studies

new_example: Siamo piaciuti alla famiglia che ci ha ospitato durante il viaggio
new_example_english: We appealed to family that hosted us during trip

new_example: Siete piaciuti ai clienti per il servizio eccellente che avete fornito?
new_example_english: Did you appeal to customers for excellent service you provided?

new_example: Sono piaciuti al pubblico durante lo spettacolo che hanno messo in scena
new_example_english: They appealed to audience during show they staged

new_example: Piovo sempre nel momento sbagliato quando la gente organizza feste all'aperto
new_example_english: I always rain at wrong time when people organize outdoor parties

new_example: Tu piovi spesso in questa regione durante la stagione delle piogge?
new_example_english: Do you often rain in this region during rainy season?

new_example: Piove sempre quando dimentichiamo l'ombrello a casa durante le uscite
new_example_english: It always rains when we forget umbrella at home during outings

new_example: Pioviamo tutto il giorno e i contadini sono felici per i raccolti
new_example_english: We rain all day and farmers are happy for crops

new_example: Piovete spesso durante l'estate in questa zona montana del paese?
new_example_english: Do you often rain during summer in this mountainous area of country?

new_example: Piovono gocce enormi che fanno rumore sul tetto della casa
new_example_english: They rain huge drops that make noise on house roof

new_example: Pioverò sicuramente domani secondo le previsioni meteorologiche accurate
new_example_english: I will surely rain tomorrow according to accurate weather forecasts

new_example: Tu pioverai durante la festa di matrimonio che si terrà in giardino?
new_example_english: Will you rain during wedding party that will be held in garden?

new_example: Pioverà per tutta la settimana secondo i meteorologi esperti
new_example_english: It will rain all week according to expert meteorologists

new_example: Pioveremo abbondantemente per riempire i serbatoi d'acqua della città
new_example_english: We will rain abundantly to fill city water reservoirs

new_example: Pioverete durante le vacanze che abbiamo pianificato al mare?
new_example_english: Will you rain during beach vacation we planned?

new_example: Pioveranno per giorni consecutivi portando sollievo alla siccità
new_example_english: They will rain for consecutive days bringing relief to drought

new_example: Ho piovuto tutta la notte allagando le strade della città bassa
new_example_english: I rained all night flooding streets of lower city

new_example: Hai piovuto durante la partita di calcio rovinando il campo?
new_example_english: Did you rain during soccer game ruining field?

new_example: È piovuto per tre giorni consecutivi causando problemi di traffico
new_example_english: It rained for three consecutive days causing traffic problems

new_example: Abbiamo piovuto abbondantemente riempiendo tutti i pozzi della regione
new_example_english: We rained abundantly filling all wells in region

new_example: Avete piovuto durante il picnic che era stato organizzato nel parco?
new_example_english: Did you rain during picnic that was organized in park?

new_example: Hanno piovuto gocce di grandine danneggiando le auto parcheggiate
new_example_english: They rained hail drops damaging parked cars

new_example: Porto sempre con me un libro interessante per leggere durante i viaggi
new_example_english: I always carry interesting book with me to read during trips

new_example: Tu porti mai fiori alla tua fidanzata per farle una sorpresa romantica?
new_example_english: Do you ever bring flowers to your girlfriend to give her romantic surprise?

new_example: Lei porta i bambini a scuola ogni mattina prima di andare al lavoro
new_example_english: She takes children to school every morning before going to work

new_example: Portiamo sempre regali quando andiamo a trovare parenti e amici
new_example_english: We always bring gifts when visiting relatives and friends

new_example: Voi portate spesso le borse della spesa pesanti ai vostri genitori anziani?
new_example_english: Do you often carry heavy shopping bags for your elderly parents?

new_example: Portano fortuna a tutti quelli che li incontrano sulla loro strada
new_example_english: They bring luck to everyone who meets them on their path

new_example: Porterò mia figlia all'altare nel giorno del suo matrimonio con emozione
new_example_english: I will walk my daughter down aisle on her wedding day with emotion

new_example: Tu porterai finalmente quella valigia pesante che stai trascinando da ore?
new_example_english: Will you finally carry that heavy suitcase you've been dragging for hours?

new_example: Lei porterà buone notizie alla famiglia quando tornerà dal viaggio
new_example_english: She will bring good news to family when returning from trip

new_example: Porteremo aiuti umanitari alle popolazioni colpite dal disastro naturale
new_example_english: We will bring humanitarian aid to populations affected by natural disaster

new_example: Voi porterete i vostri bambini al parco divertimenti durante il weekend?
new_example_english: Will you take your children to amusement park during weekend?

new_example: Porteranno innovazione nel settore tecnologico con le loro ricerche avanzate
new_example_english: They will bring innovation to technology sector with their advanced research

new_example: Ho portato mia madre dal medico per un controllo di routine
new_example_english: I took my mother to doctor for routine checkup

new_example: Hai portato tutti i documenti necessari per completare la pratica burocratica?
new_example_english: Did you bring all necessary documents to complete bureaucratic procedure?

new_example: Ha portato felicità nella vita di tante persone con la sua generosità
new_example_english: He brought happiness into many people's lives with his generosity

new_example: Abbiamo portato la macchina dal meccanico per riparare il motore
new_example_english: We took car to mechanic to repair engine

new_example: Avete portato abbastanza cibo per tutti gli invitati della festa?
new_example_english: Did you bring enough food for all party guests?

new_example: Hanno portato scompiglio nella vita tranquilla del piccolo paese
new_example_english: They brought upheaval to peaceful life of small village

new_example: Posso sempre contare sull'aiuto della mia famiglia durante i momenti difficili
new_example_english: I can always count on my family's help during difficult moments

new_example: Tu puoi venire alla festa di compleanno che organizziamo sabato sera?
new_example_english: Can you come to birthday party we're organizing Saturday evening?

new_example: Lei può suonare il pianoforte magnificamente dopo anni di studio costante
new_example_english: She can play piano magnificently after years of constant study

new_example: Possiamo risolvere questo problema se lavoriamo insieme con determinazione e pazienza
new_example_english: We can solve this problem if we work together with determination and patience

new_example: Voi potete aiutarci a spostare questi mobili pesanti nel appartamento nuovo?
new_example_english: Can you help us move this heavy furniture to new apartment?

new_example: Possono raggiungere qualsiasi obiettivo se continuano ad impegnarsi con passione
new_example_english: They can achieve any goal if they continue working with passion

new_example: Potrò finalmente realizzare il mio sogno quando avrò risparmiato abbastanza denaro
new_example_english: I will be able to finally realize my dream when I save enough money

new_example: Tu potrai venire con noi in vacanza se risolverai i problemi di lavoro?
new_example_english: Will you be able to come on vacation with us if you solve work problems?

new_example: Lei potrà laurearsi con il massimo dei voti se continuerà a studiare
new_example_english: She will be able to graduate with highest marks if she continues studying

new_example: Potremo comprare casa quando entrambi avremo un lavoro stabile e sicuro
new_example_english: We will be able to buy house when we both have stable and secure job

new_example: Voi potrete visitare tutti i musei della città con questo biglietto speciale?
new_example_english: Will you be able to visit all city museums with this special ticket?

new_example: Potranno viaggiare per il mondo quando andranno in pensione insieme
new_example_english: They will be able to travel around world when they retire together

new_example: Ho potuto incontrare il mio idolo musicale durante il concerto privato
new_example_english: I was able to meet my musical idol during private concert

new_example: Hai potuto parlare con il direttore della questione che ti preoccupava?
new_example_english: Were you able to talk with director about matter that worried you?

new_example: Ha potuto laurearsi nonostante tutte le difficoltà economiche della famiglia
new_example_english: He was able to graduate despite all family's economic difficulties

new_example_english: We were able to save dog that was trapped in river

new_example: Avete potuto risolvere il problema tecnico che bloccava il computer?
new_example_english: Were you able to solve technical problem that was blocking computer?

new_example: Hanno potuto realizzare il progetto grazie all'aiuto di tutti i volontari
new_example_english: They were able to realize project thanks to help of all volunteers

new_example: Pranzo sempre alla stessa ora per mantenere una routine alimentare regolare
new_example_english: I always have lunch at same time to maintain regular eating routine

new_example_english: Do you ever have lunch out during work week or always bring sandwich?

new_example_english: She lunches elegantly in city's best restaurants with important clients

new_example_english: We have lunch together every Sunday to keep family traditions alive

new_example_english: Do you often have lunch with office colleagues or prefer eating alone?

new_example_english: They always have lunch with extended family during important religious holidays

new_example_english: I will have lunch at starred restaurant to celebrate work promotion obtained

new_example_english: She will have lunch with mayor to discuss urban redevelopment project

new_example_english: We will all have lunch together in garden during end-of-year party

new_example_english: Will you have lunch at new Japanese restaurant that opened near home?

new_example_english: They will have lunch on hotel terrace admiring breathtaking panorama

new_example: Ho pranzato magnificamente ieri in quel ristorante che mi avevi consigliato
new_example_english: I had magnificent lunch yesterday at that restaurant you recommended

new_example_english: Did you have enough lunch or do you want more homemade dessert from grandmother?

new_example_english: He had lunch alone while reading newspaper in garden tranquility

new_example: Abbiamo pranzato sulla terrazza ammirando il tramonto spettacolare sul mare
new_example_english: We had lunch on terrace admiring spectacular sunset over sea

new_example: Avete pranzato bene durante la vacanza in Francia o il cibo non vi piaceva?

new_example_english: They had lunch together to discuss important details of business contract

new_example: Prendo sempre l'autobus delle otto per arrivare puntuale al lavoro ogni mattina
new_example_english: I always take eight o'clock bus to arrive punctually at work every morning

new_example_english: She takes piano lessons from famous teacher to improve technique

new_example_english: We always take time for ourselves during weekends to relax completely

new_example_english: They always take longest route to avoid heavy downtown traffic

new_example_english: I will make important decision that will completely change my future life

new_example_english: Will you finally take that vacation you deserve after years of work?

new_example_english: She will get degree with highest marks if she continues like this

new_example_english: They will take drastic measures if economic situation doesn't improve soon

new_example_english: I made right decision when I changed jobs two years ago

new_example_english: Did you take all medicines doctor had prescribed for you?

new_example_english: He took courage and confessed his feelings to girl

new_example_english: We took last available train to arrive on time for ceremony
